医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
吸烟者对电子烟危害的看法恶化，与对香烟的担忧相当或超过过去十年，英国吸烟者对电子烟危害的看法有所恶化，认为电子烟危害低于香烟的人数显着下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Smokers-views-on-e-香烟-harm-worsen-matching-or-exceeding-concerns-for-香烟.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Smokers-views-on-e-香烟-harm-worsen-matching-or-exceeding-concerns-for-香烟.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=138f8784-32f5-419a-9213-bbd8e984b92d Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:59:00 -0500 Smokers' views on e-cigarette harm worsen, matching or exceeding concerns for cigarettes
研究揭示了中性粒细胞中隐藏的意想不到的复杂程度3月5日，中国科学院上海免疫与感染研究所（SIII）张晓明教授和张晓明教授在《Cell》杂志上发表了一项研究。复旦大学的高强、范佳和杨力发现了中性粒细胞中隐藏的意想不到的复杂程度，此前人们认为中性粒细胞是相对均匀的短寿命免疫细胞群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Study-uncovers-unexpected-level-of-complexity-hidden-within-neutropils.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Study-uncovers-unexpected-level-of-complexity-hidden-within-neutropils.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4980fd0b-1530-4cae-9053-c1c276e13cf8 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:51:00 -0500 Study uncovers unexpected level of complexity hidden within neutrophils
研究人员发现预测不吸烟成年人吸电子烟的心理因素奥塔哥大学的研究人员发现了三个心理因素，可以预测不吸烟者是否会开始吸电子烟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Researchers-discover-psychological-factors-that-predict-vaping-uptake-in-non-smoking-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Researchers-discover-psychological-factors-that-predict-vaping-uptake-in-non-smoking-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5b2ffb4-e95a-4932-ba8b-747f7aa8d0d0 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:46:19 -0500 Researchers discover psychological factors that predict vaping uptake in non-smoking adults
关于病毒如何破坏心脏功能并导致心源性猝死的新见解VTC 弗拉林生物医学研究所的科学家们对有时会影响心脏的致命病毒感染有了新的认识，这是一项可能改变游戏规则的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/New-insights-into-how-viruses-disrupt-heart-function-and-lead-to-sudden-cardiac-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/New-insights-into-how-viruses-disrupt-heart-function-and-lead-to-sudden-cardiac-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b69ef4f-87c6-4537-a3df-6b2a864f6525 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:41:52 -0500 New insights into how viruses disrupt heart function and lead to sudden cardiac deaths
五味子酚抑制小鼠细胞因子风暴和急性肺损伤细胞因子风暴（CS）是一种急性全身炎症反应，迄今为止有效的干预措施有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Schisanhenol-suppresses-cytokine-storm-and-acute-lung-injury-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Schisanhenol-suppresses-cytokine-storm-and-acute-lung-injury-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76c1ce6a-1d6a-45b0-9bdb-9af38df745fc Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:35:59 -0500 Schisanhenol suppresses cytokine storm and acute lung injury in mice
退伍军人在大流行后面临疲劳和残疾，无论有或没有 COVID-19 病史感染 COVID-19 后 18 个月的退伍军人表现出与未感染者相似的日常生活活动水平，表明该病毒对该群体的长期功能影响很小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Veterans-face-fatigue-and-disability-post-pandemic-with-or-without-COVID-19-history.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Veterans-face-fatigue-and-disability-post-pandemic-with-or-without-COVID-19-history.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40354028-82f4-48c7-a1ca-c46391597470 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:31:00 -0500 Veterans face fatigue and disability post-pandemic, with or without COVID-19 history
特发性震颤与痴呆风险增加相关根据 2024 年 3 月 6 日发布的研究，特发性震颤（一种导致不自主颤抖的运动障碍）患者中痴呆症的发病率可能是普通人群的三倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Essential-tremor- Associated-with-increased-risk-of-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Essential-tremor- Associated-with-increased-risk-of-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae4b8c0a-6489-4c63-a4e9-3e5f76fa0f29 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:07:09 -0500 Essential tremor associated with increased risk of dementia
与精神疾病重复行为相关的关键脑细胞纹状体中表达 Crym 的星形胶质细胞已被确定为神经精神疾病中常见行为的关键调节因子，为靶向治疗开辟了新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Key-brain-cells-linked-to-repetitive-behaviors-in-psychiatric-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Key-brain-cells-linked-to-repetitive-behaviors-in-psychiatric-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73ba4515-7772-4456-bcea-e825ab95683a Wed, 06 Mar 2024 21:54:00 -0500 Key brain cells linked to repetitive behaviors in psychiatric diseases
新的医疗保险支付模式对服务高社会风险患者的透析设施提出了挑战一项对 2,000 多家透析机构随机分配到新的医疗保险支付模式的新研究，旨在改善终末期肾病患者的治疗结果，结果发现，不成比例地为高社会风险人群提供服务的机构对家庭透析和移植候补的使用率较低，并且肾移植次数较少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/New-Medicare- payment-model-challenges-diaanalysis-facilities-serving-病人-with-high-social-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/New-Medicare- payment-model-challenges-diaanalysis-facilities-serving-病人-with-high-social-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4f772fe-b525-4c18-a495-8dfa961ca109 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 21:48:39 -0500 New Medicare payment model challenges dialysis facilities serving patients with high social risk
肠道细菌菌株可能是预测癌症治疗成功的关键研究人员发现，肠道微生物菌株可以预测免疫检查点阻断（ICB）疗法对罕见癌症患者的有效性和副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Gut-bacteria-strains-could-be-the-key-to-predicting-cancer-treatment-success.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Gut-bacteria-strains-could-be-the-key-to-predicting-cancer-treatment-success.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab9c658a-9952-4ae1-be76-d0261ce17072 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 21:46:00 -0500 Gut bacteria strains could be the key to predicting cancer treatment success
